original_text: “Our father died in the wilderness. He was not among the company of those who gathered themselves together against the Lord in the company of Korah, but died for his own sin. And he had no sons.
korean_text: 우리 아버지가 광야에서 죽었으나 여호와를 거슬러 모인 고라의 무리에 들지 아니하고 자기 죄로 죽었고 아들이 없나이다

sentences.original_text: Our father died in the wilderness.
He was not among the company of those
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 무리 중에 있지 않았는데

sentences.original_text: who gathered themselves together against the Lord

sentences.korean_translation: 고라의 무리와 함께 한 것이 아니고,

sentences.original_text: but died for his own sin.
